name: Simple PDF Reader 2020
description: View And Search All PDF Files with Fast and Simple PDF Reader. This PDF Reader is simple but powerful tool to view All pdf Files in one place. PDF Reader Extracts All pdf files from storage Automatically.   Features  1. Simple List of PDF Files 2. File Search with keyword  3. Double Tap to zoom in and zoom out 4. goto page number directly 5. Fast Page Scrolling Horizontal and Vertical 6. View page count and total pages count 7. Extract All pdf files from Storage 9. Night mode for reading at night 9. Swipe Page by Page  Enjoy Free Simple PDF Reader.
